text: Sir William Hepburn McAlpine, 6th Baronet (12 January 1936 â€“ 4 March 2018) was a British businessman. He was director of the construction company Sir Robert McAlpine. British Rail Class 60 60008 of EWS was named in his honour. McAlpine became involved in a plan to save the Romney, Hythe and Dymchurch Railway and became its chairman. McAlpine died on 4 March 2018 at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile in The Times * Fawley Hill official website Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Businesspeople from London
title: Sir William McAlpine, 6th Baronet
